projects.title: Assignment & Resource Management System (ARMS)
projects.description: A full-stack Learning Management System (LMS) that provides a unified platform for students, teachers, and administrators to manage assignments, course materials, submissions, evaluations, and academic data with secure role-based access.

projects.title: IT Printer & Resource Management System
projects.description: A web-based IT management system designed to handle printer resources, staff complaints, service engineers, notices, and user roles. The system supports role-based dashboards for managers, IT staff, engineers, and employees, enabling efficient complaint tracking, resource allocation, and maintenance workflows.
